WaitThenPrison: ^And so, nothing happened for some time.
Imprisoned: ^From behind bars, you hear a jingling of coins down the hall.
LookupInCell: ^A guard slowly paces into your view.
LookCloser: ^You look closer, and notice something odd about his uniform.
^At his wrists and collar there are colorful, golden glows.
^His pockets are overflowing with gems and golden coins!

g-0: ^It's your own funeral. He noticed you and is approaching the bars.

ThiefGuardHello: ^Don't laugh at me please! I need these gmes to feed my children!
